description: This file defines a React functional component for a Products management page, including product listing, adding, editing, and deleting functionalities using Material UI components.

methods.name: ProductsPage
methods.description: Main React component managing product list, dialogs, and CRUD operations.

methods.name: getProducts
methods.description: Fetches the list of products from API and updates state.

methods.name: handleSave
methods.description: Saves the new or edited product via API call.

methods.name: handleDelete
methods.description: Deletes a product via API call.

methods.name: openEdit
methods.description: Opens dialog to edit a selected product.
